entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
